name: Samurai of Squares and Bla(c)k holes
name_original: Samurai of Squares and Bla(c)k holes
description:
!
FULLSCREEN STRONGLY RECOMMENEDED
!

Square story about square samurai, who is fighting with square aliens, using a bla(c)k holes!
5 levels, minimalistic design and a lots of fun with bla(c)k holes :3

Made for: Weekly Game Jam - Week 211
